lyrics.stanza: Jesus, I love You, My treasure, You are; How could I choose anything less than You? Dear Lord, my inmost heart You've captured and won.

Thank You Lord, You opened my blind eyes to see I was lame, but now I can walk; You healed me! My leprosy, Lord, You cleansed all away; My ears were opened to hear Your voice, And now I follow You 'cause...

Sometimes Lord, I'm drawn off by my selfish cares; And the world it draws me with glitter and glare. O Lord, You've trapped me. Don't let me go. Kiss me and woo me, and win my heart, So, I will always tell You...
